auth.title: Welcome to
auth.subtitle: Sign in to unlock your digital life.

privacy.text: By signing in, you agree to our

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.text: HashPass ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our digital event platform and services (the "Service"). Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the Service.

collection.title: 2. Information We Collect
collection.text:
We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:

‚Ä¢ Account Information: When you sign in with Google, we collect your name, email address, and profile picture.
‚Ä¢ Event Data: Information about events you attend, passes you hold, and interactions within our platform.
‚Ä¢ Usage Data: Information about how you use our Service, including features accessed and actions taken.
‚Ä¢ Device Information: Technical information about your device, browser, and operating system.

use.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
use.text:
We use the information we collect to:

‚Ä¢ Provide and maintain our Service
‚Ä¢ Process your event registrations and manage your passes
‚Ä¢ Send you important updates about events and services
‚Ä¢ Improve and personalize your experience
‚Ä¢ Detect and prevent fraud or abuse
‚Ä¢ Comply with legal obligations

sharing.title: 4. Information Sharing and Disclosure
sharing.text:
We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:

‚Ä¢ With event organizers for events you register for
‚Ä¢ With service providers who assist us in operating our platform
‚Ä¢ When required by law or to protect our rights
‚Ä¢ In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets

security.title: 5. Data Security
security.text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.text:
You have the right to:

‚Ä¢ Access your personal information
‚Ä¢ Correct inaccurate information
‚Ä¢ Request deletion of your information
‚Ä¢ Object to processing of your information
‚Ä¢ Data portability
‚Ä¢ Withdraw consent at any time

cookies.title: 7. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.text: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our Service and hold certain information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.

changes.title: 8. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.text: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.

contact.title: 9. Contact Us
contact.text:
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

Email: privacy@hashpass.tech
Website: https://hashpass.tech

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.text: By accessing and using HashPass ("the Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

description.title: 2. Service Description
description.text: HashPass is a digital event platform that provides event management, pass management, networking features, and related services. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of the Service at any time.

accounts.title: 3. User Accounts
accounts.text:
You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials. You agree to:

‚Ä¢ Provide accurate and complete information
‚Ä¢ Keep your account information updated
‚Ä¢ Not share your account with others
‚Ä¢ Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use
‚Ä¢ Accept responsibility for all activities under your account

conduct.title: 4. User Conduct
conduct.text:
You agree not to:

‚Ä¢ Violate any laws or regulations
‚Ä¢ Infringe on intellectual property rights
‚Ä¢ Transmit harmful code or malware
‚Ä¢ Harass, abuse, or harm other users
‚Ä¢ Collect user data without permission
‚Ä¢ Impersonate others or provide false information
‚Ä¢ Interfere with the Service's operation

content.title: 5. User Content
content.text: You retain ownership of content you submit to the Service. By submitting content, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, modify, and distribute your content for the purpose of providing and improving the Service.

intellectual.title: 6. Intellectual Property
intellectual.text: The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by HashPass and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws.

termination.title: 7. Termination
termination.text: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the Service immediately, without prior notice, for any reason, including if you breach the Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the Service will cease immediately.

disclaimer.title: 8. Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.text: The Service is provided "as is" and "as available" without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not warrant that the Service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free.

limitation.title: 9. Limitation of Liability
limitation.text: In no event shall HashPass be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including loss of profits, data, or use, incurred by you or any third party, whether in an action in contract or tort.

changes.title: 10. Changes to Terms
changes.text: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes by posting the new Terms on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date. Your continued use of the Service after such modifications constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.

contact.title: 11. Contact Information
contact.text:
If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:

Email: legal@hashpass.tech
Website: https://hashpass.tech

secure.description: Your data is encrypted and protected with industry-leading security protocols. We prioritize your privacy above all else.

management.title: Effortless Management
management.description: Organize all your digital credentials, loyalty cards, and communities in one intuitive place.

sync.title: Cross-Platform Sync
sync.description: Access your data across all your devices with our secure cloud sync.

index.readyToSimplify: Ready to Simplify Your Digital Life?

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: What our users say
testimonials.description: See what our customers have to say about us.

footer.tagline: Connecting events, speakers, and attendees worldwide.

interactiveDocs.title: Interactive Documentation
interactiveDocs.description: Explore step-by-step guides with interactive examples

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: Learn how to sign in and navigate the app

signIn.title: Sign In to Your Account
signIn.content: To get started, you'll need to sign in to the HashPass app. Open the app, enter your email address, check your email for a one-time login code, and enter the code to access your account.

explore.title: Explore Speakers & Events
explore.content: Once you're signed in, you can browse through the amazing speakers and events. Navigate to the Explore section, browse speakers by category or search for specific names, and view speaker profiles, topics, and availability.

requestMeeting.title: Send a Meeting Request
requestMeeting.content: Ready to connect with a speaker? Find a speaker you'd like to meet, tap on their profile to view details, click the "Request Meeting" button, select your preferred date and time slot, add a message (optional), and submit your request.

trackRequests.title: Track Your Requests
trackRequests.content: Keep track of all your meeting requests. Check the Notifications section for updates, view pending, accepted, or declined requests, and receive notifications when speakers respond.

loadingIssues.title: Having Issues Loading the Web App?
loadingIssues.content: If you're experiencing problems loading the web app, we recommend clearing your browser cache or performing a hard refresh.
loadingIssues.step1: Clear browser cache: Go to your browser settings and clear cached images and files
loadingIssues.step2: Hard refresh: Press Ctrl+Shift+R (Windows/Linux) or Cmd+Shift+R (Mac) to reload the page without cache

loginIssues.title: Login Problems
loginIssues.content: If you're having trouble logging in, make sure you're using the correct email address and check your spam folder for the login code. If the code has expired, request a new one.

meetingIssues.title: Meeting Request Issues
meetingIssues.content: If your meeting requests aren't being sent or received, check your internet connection, ensure you're signed in, and verify that the speaker has availability during your selected time slot.

specificRequests.title: Be Specific in Meeting Requests
specificRequests.content: Speakers appreciate knowing what you'd like to discuss. Be specific in your meeting request message to increase the chances of acceptance.

checkAvailability.title: Check Speaker Availability
checkAvailability.content: Before sending requests, check the speaker's availability calendar to ensure they're free during your preferred time slot.

respondPromptly.title: Respond Promptly
respondPromptly.content: When a speaker accepts your meeting request, respond promptly to confirm your meeting and show your commitment.

useSearch.title: Use the Search Function
useSearch.content: Use the search function to find speakers by topic, company, or name. This will help you quickly find the right people to connect with.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of users who trust HASHPASS with their digital life.
